attributes.action: Call an immediate General election. We have no faith in the current government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has raised taxes, squandered our money on massive pay for Doctors and civil servants whilst failing to provide a decent health service and a terrible education system.  He takes credit when things are booming despite his policies and denies responsibility when times are bad.  

He can not even be trusted to hold on to power he does have since we are being railroaded into signing the European Treaty despite the manifesto promise of a referendum

GO NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
